items.title: What is Photo Metadata
items.description: photo metadata is information about an image that is embedded into the image file itself. It is used to describe the image and to provide contact information for the creator and copyright.

items.title: What is the IPTC Photo Metadata Standard
items.description: the IPTC Photo Metadata Standard is the most widely used standard for describing photos, because of its universal acceptance among news agencies, photographers, photo agencies, libraries, museums, and other related industries.
